name: Jewel Quest (itch)
description:
Jewel Quest is another stunning and classico match3 puzzle game !!!

It is designed with stunning graphics effects and challenging level , with two modes Arcade and Classico .

Try to get highest score at each level to digging to mania treasure . Cute Pig is your avatar on the long

path to diamond treasure .

You will be charmed with luxury gems and ton of combo but timing is rushing right now

★How to play ★

- Match3 or more identical jewels in a row to remove cells

- Match the gems until the board transparency,the jewel star will appear.

- Make the star down to last line to pass the level.

★Features ★

It's simple and fun to play this Jewel Quest with 2 main game modes: Arcade , Classico .

Create electrifying special gems like Flame , Star gems, Hypercubes and Supernova.

★★Arcade Mode★★: More than 250 challenging levels and 13 pretty worlds in the game.

- Match 3 to clear the cells

- Match 4 can win the jewel's bomb and 1 lighting.

- Match 5 can win color-changing jewels and 2 lightings.

- Specials Items

● The bomb can eliminate the jewels around.

● The energy can eliminate to any other colored.

● The timing can extend the playing time.

● Swapping and matching your way, show your best strategical moves to get highest scores to digging to

mania diamond treasure.

★★Classic mode ★★

- 8 different diamond style and many special items (lightning blaze, blast bomb, colorful star , combo

time...)

- ton of challenging level

★★Stunning Graphics and Effects★★
